These files didn't come with this license but I emailed the author and he said it was cool for me to use the test ROMs under the license in LICENSE.

Subject: Re: License for your gameboy test roms?
To: Mike Gerow <gerow@mgerow.com>

Thanks for the feedback. You can paste this into the files near the
beginning (essentially the MIT/modified BSD license):

; Copyright (C) 2009 Shay Green <gblargg@gmail.com>.
; Permission to use, copy, modify, and/or distribute this
; software for any purpose with or without fee is hereby granted,
; provided that the above copyright notice and this permission
; notice appear in all copies. PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY.

On Wed, Jul 13, 2016 at 9:45 PM, Mike Gerow <gerow@mgerow.com> wrote:

> Hi Shay,
>
> I'm working on a gameboy emulator just as a fun little project here <
> https://github.com/gerow/blitzle>. Your test ROMs have been a huge asset
> and I was considering integrating them into automated tests that dump the
> serial out and ensure the tests indicate success. I couldn't find a license
> for them, though. Are they under any kind of free software license? If not
> could they be :)
>
> Much thanks!
